Title: To Be Looked At: Painting and Sculpture from the Collection

Date

Sat Jun 29 2002 until Tue Sep 07 2004

Location
  • MoMA type:exhibition building spaces
  • 11 West 53rd St. type:thoroughfare names
External web page for the exhibition

www.moma.org

Carried out by

The Museum of Modern Art

Browse other exhibitions carried out by The Museum of Modern Art
Authority files for The Museum of Modern Art

  • www.wikidata.org


Artists and other Influencers

There were 100 persons who influenced this exhibition.

Persons are ordered alphabetically by surname. Select a letter in the concertina to continue. Click on the person's name to view further information.

Richard Artschwager

Born 1923 (click to view other people born in this year)
Died 2013
Nationality American
Gender Male

Exhibitions

In this dataset, Richard Artschwager was involved in 69 exhibitions across 6 decades.

  • Decade with the most number of exhibitions was the 1970s with 17 exhibitions.
  • Decade with the least number of exhibitions was the 1960s with 3 exhibitions.

Alexander Calder

Born 1898 (click to view other people born in this year)
Died 1976
Nationality American
Gender Male

Exhibitions

In this dataset, Alexander Calder was involved in 107 exhibitions across 9 decades.

  • Decade with the most number of exhibitions was the 1940s with 21 exhibitions.
